= Introduction =

This page document all releases.


= Details =

===08/23/2009 Alpha 2===
Support 2 modes:
  * Play with self: user play with himself (or 2 players take turn to play on one machine)
  * Play with AI: play with machine. User can select 5 different level of difficulty. Level 3 (default) is similar to previous release.
Known issues and limitation:
  * Can only play on a system with touch screen.
  * AI can takes long time to think (especially for higher level).

===08/17/2009 Alpha 1===
A first stable release with basic features:
  * User can play with AI (based on XQWLight AI from HoxChess)
  * Can start new game via Left button
Known issues and limitation:
  * Can only play on a touch screen system
  * System may appears to hang occasionally because AI takes long time to think.
